title: National debt of Germany in relation to gross domestic product 2010 to 2024
yAxis: National debt as percent of GDP
summary: This statistic shows the National debt of Germany from 2010 to 2018 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2024 .
The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state , the communities , the municipalities and the social insurances .
In 2018 , the National debt of Germany amounted to an estimate of approximately 59.75 percent of the GDP .
gold: This statistic shows the national debt of Germany from 2010 to 2018 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2024.
The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state , the communities , the municipalities and the social insurances.
In 2018 , the national debt of Germany amounted to approximately 60 percent of the GDP .
